itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Lewis "Llew"/"Lew" John Llewellyn (6 November 1881 – 1 February 1931) was a Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s and 1910s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Newport RFC, as a centre, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Ebbw Vale. and Wigan, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5,
